Main.TextJPN: 「…いつしか、その“何か”は！　…オヤシロさまと呼ばれるようになりました」
Main.TextENG: ``...We're unaware what that 'something' really was! It just came to be called Oyashiro-sama.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…そんな噂はまったく聞いた事がないよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``...I've never heard of such rumors before!``

Main.TextJPN: 「日本人の気質としてね、忌みとするものには口を閉ざしてしまうんですよ。…口に出さない事によってなかった事にしようとする」
Main.TextENG: ``It's the nature of the Japanese, to shut their mouths on the topic of taboos. ...By keeping their mouths closed, they tried to forget it ever happened.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…でも起こってしまうんですよ。…第２第３の事件が。……奇怪な事件が起こる度にオヤシロさまの祟りに怯え、ますます口を閉ざしていく」
Main.TextENG: ``...But it happened again. ...There was a second and third incident. ......Every time a mysterious incident occurred, they were frightened of Oyashiro-sama's curse, and became increasingly tight-lipped.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…管理職は事態を憂い、極力事実を隠蔽しようと図ったようです」
Main.TextENG: ``...The management became worried about the situation, so they tried as much as possible to conceal the facts.``

Main.TextJPN: 「そんな馬鹿な…！　…職員が死んだと言うのに、隠蔽だなんて！　考えられない！」
Main.TextENG: ``That's ridiculous...! ...To say staff members died, and they hid it! It's unthinkable!``

Main.TextJPN: 「別に死体を隠したとか、そういう事じゃありません。徹底的な情報管制で、無関係な人間の耳に入らないように配慮した、…という事です」
Main.TextENG: ``It's not that they hid the bodies or anything. Just thoroughly controlling the information, to make sure nothing irrelevant entered the people's ears... that was it.``

Main.TextJPN: 「これ以上、職場の士気を下げないためにね。……でも知っている人は知っているんですよ。…ねぇ、荒川さん」
Main.TextENG: ``Nothing more, in order to prevent the morale of the workplace dropping any further. But still there are people there who knows something. ......Right, Arakawa-san?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……あれは……事故だッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``......It was...... an accident!``
``...Arakawa... kun...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…はははは！　…もー勘弁して下さいよー！　…あははははは！」
Main.TextENG: ``...Ha ha ha ha! ...Please give a break! ...Ah ha ha ha ha ha!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…何が可笑しいの？」
Main.TextENG: ``...What's so funny?``

Main.TextJPN: 「だ、だって…笑うなって方が無理ですよ。…はははは！　…ねぇ！　この現代にさー！」
Main.TextENG: ``B-Because... it's impossible not to laugh. ...Ha ha ha ha! ...Right! Something like that in this modern age!``

Main.TextJPN: 「あーっはっはっはっは！　笑っちゃえ笑っちゃえ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Ah ha ha ha ha ha! Come on, laugh!``

Main.TextJPN: 「笑いましたよッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``I laughed!``

Main.TextJPN: 「こんな馬鹿な事があってたまるかって、笑いましたよッ！　僕も！　仲間も！　みんな！　みんなッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``I doubted the possibility wherever such stupid things could exist, and laughed! I did! My colleagues did! Everyone! Everyone did!``

Main.TextJPN: 「そして再び起こった。次の犠牲者は都市河川室の柿沼さんという方でした」
Main.TextENG: ``And then it happened again. The next victim was someone called Kakinuma-san from the Urban River Office.``

Main.TextJPN: 「沼さんのは事故だよッ！　…祟りなんかじゃないッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Numa-san's case was an accident! ...It wasn't the curse!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…お友達でしたか？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Was he your friend?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…い、いや。…知らない職員だ」
Main.TextENG: ``...N-No. ...Most of the employees didn't know him.``

Main.TextJPN: 「酒と博打の好きなよく笑う人だった。…僕の直接の仕事の前任者で、歳は離れていたけどよく飲みに行きましたよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``He was a big joke who liked sake and gambling. ...He was my predecessor in work, we were years apart in age but always went drinking!``

Main.TextJPN: 「１０は若く見える美人の奥さんがいるくせに毎晩毎晩飲み明かしてるんですよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``And although he had beautiful wife who looked ten years younger than him, he still drunk the night away, every single night!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…たまには早い時間に帰ってあげた方がいいんじゃないですか」
Main.TextENG: ``...Occasionally I would say to him, 'Don't you think you should go home early?', and he would say...``

Main.TextJPN: 「いいかい荒ちゃん。結婚なんてするもんじゃねえぞ～？　自由な時間がいくらでも持てる独身の内がハナなんだぞ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Listen, Ara-chan. Do you actually think being married is a good thing? Being single with alot of free time is the best!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…どうも疲れてるみたいでした。連日の激務でしたからね。無理もない事だと思ってました」
Main.TextENG: ``...He always seemed to be tired for some reason. It could have been from working hard day every day. But it didn't matter what I thought.``

Main.TextJPN: 「終電はとっくになくなってましたからね。…いつものように沼さんの車で送ってもらってる時でした。…僕、言ったんですよ。…沼さん、だいぶ疲れてるみたいですねって」
Main.TextENG: ``Then one day, the last train I could catch was long gone. ...So Numa-san offered to drive me home in his car, like he always did. ...Then... I said to him... ...'Numa-san, you look very tired'.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…ここんトコ、寝苦しくてなぁ…。なかなか眠れないんだよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...You're right about that, I haven't slept well lately... It's been difficult to get any sleep.``

Main.TextJPN: 「は！　…はははは！　…沼さん、やめて下さいよ！　…沼さんの所にまで現れるんですかー！？　例のアレ」
Main.TextENG: ``Ha! ...Ha ha ha ha! ...Numa-san, please stop that! ...Numa-san, does it even appear at your place!? This thing.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……………荒ちゃんは何も感じないかい。…夜とか」
Main.TextENG: ``...............Ara-chan, don't you feel anything... ...at night...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「夜に感じるって、…ははは！　何かやらしー話ですねー！」
Main.TextENG: ``Feel anything at night...? Ha ha ha! Now you're talking dirty!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…………確かに“いる”んだよ。………“いる”」
Main.TextENG: ``............Definitely, 'it exists'. .........'It exists'.``

Main.TextJPN: 「………気になって灯を点けるんだ。…だけど部屋には女房と子供しかいない。当たり前だよな。…………でもやっぱり“いる”んだよ」
Main.TextENG: ``.........I felt uneasy and turned on the light. ...But there was only my wife and child in the room. That was ordinary to see. .........But still, I know 'it exists'.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…沼さん勘弁して下さいよ…。…いるいるいるいるって、…何がいるって言うんです？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Numa-san, please give me a break... ...You say, it exists, it exists, it exists, it exists... but what is this it you're talking about?``

Main.TextJPN: 「………近藤さんもさ。…ひと月くらい前から、そんなこと言ってたよな…」
Main.TextENG: ``.........Kondo-san. ...About one month ago, he also said those words...``

Main.TextJPN: 「近藤さんは、ほらちょっと！　…なんていうのか…そういう所がありましたし…」
Main.TextENG: ``Kondo-san... you know, he was a bit off! ...I don't know how to put this... That's how it was...``

Main.TextJPN: 「……近藤さんの所にもさ、……俺の所と同じヤツが……“いた”のかもな」
Main.TextENG: ``......At Kondo-san's place...... perhaps the same guy at his...... is the same 'thing' at mine.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……やめましょうよ。近藤さんの話は！」
Main.TextENG: ``......Let's stop this. This story about Kondo-san!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…わかるよ。……多分、近藤さんが“いる”って言ってたヤツが…あいつなんだよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...I understand. ......But maybe, the same thing Kondo-san said 'exists'... is that thing.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…あいつは間違いなく“いる”んだ。…日が経つごとに、強く感じられるようになる」
Main.TextENG: ``...No doubt about it, that 'thing' definitely exists. ...Whenever a day goes by, the feeling becomes stronger.``

Main.TextJPN: 「もうやめませんか。この話。…面白くないですよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Will you stop it?! This story. ...is not funny!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…あぁ！　…やめようか。……でもな、…日増しに気配を強く感じるようになるんだよ。本当だぜ？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Oh! ...I will stop. ......But... I can feel its presence around me growing stronger day by day. I'm talking the truth!``

Main.TextJPN: 「………瞼をふっと開ければ、…そこに立ってるんじゃないか、ってくらいに」
Main.TextENG: ``.........And whenever I suddenly open my eyelids... it's like it's standing there, watching me.``

Main.TextJPN: ライト消え、舞台真っ暗になる。
Main.TextENG: Light disappears,@rand the stage becomes pitch black.

Main.TextJPN: 「…俺さ。…もうすぐ“会える”と思うんだよ。………オヤシロさまに」
Main.TextENG: ``...I think. ...I'll 'meet' it soon. .........Oyashiro-sama.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…その日の深夜ですよね。……対向車線のダンプに突っ込み、亡くなられました」
Main.TextENG: ``...Then, in the middle of the night that day. ......His car plunged into a dump truck on the opposite lane, and he died.``

Main.TextJPN: 「事故ですよッ！　…あんな話のあった直後とは言え！　…事故なんですよッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``It was an accident! ...That said, this happened immediately after we talked! ...It was an accident!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……でも奥さんには…そんな話はとてもできなかった！　…こんな馬鹿げた話、…出来るわけがないッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``......But I couldn't tell his wife... there was no way I could tell her such a thing! ...Such an absurd story... I couldn't do it!``

Main.TextJPN: 「当初は居眠り運転かと考えられました。でも実際は違った。…柿沼さんの遺体は喉が掻きむしられていました」
Main.TextENG: ``At first, I thought he had fell asleep while driving. But in reality, it was much different. ...Kakinuma-san, his corpse was found with its throat scratched.``

Main.TextJPN: 「両の手は血だらけで、爪の剥がれている指もありました」
Main.TextENG: ``Both of his hands were full of blood, and all of his finger nails were peeled off.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…ちょっとよく飲み込めないんですけど…、」
Main.TextENG: ``...I can't really swallow this well...``

Main.TextJPN: 「…つまりね。…彼は死の直前、何を思ったのか自分の喉を掻きむしり始めたのよ。…生爪が剥がれるくらいの…恐ろしい力でね」
Main.TextENG: ``...In other words. ...Just before his death, he thought of something and began scratching at his own throat. ...If even his fingernails were peeled off... he must have used a terrible amount of force.``

Main.TextJPN: 「なんであんた、そんな事まで知ってるんだ！？　…その事は、」
Main.TextENG: ``Do you... know anything about this!? ...This thing.``

Main.TextJPN: 「調べたんですよ。…一応ライターの端くれですからね」
Main.TextENG: ``Because I examined it. ...And because I'm a writer, albeit a minor one.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……どうしてそんな事を…」
Main.TextENG: ``......Why did such a thing happen...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…彼は“会って”しまったのよ。………………オヤシロさまに」
Main.TextENG: ``...That man, he 'met' it. ..................Oyashiro-sama.``

Main.TextJPN: 遠雷。@k@r雨の音。@k@r重苦しい沈黙。
Main.TextENG: Distant thunder.@k@rThe sound of rain.@k@rHeavy silence.

Main.TextJPN: 「森さんと加藤さんのことはご存知ですか？」
Main.TextENG: ``Do you know Mori-san and Kato-san?``

Main.TextJPN: 「知らないッ！　その二人の事は本当に知らない！　…加藤さんの事は本当に…聞いただけで……よくは知らないんですッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``I don't know! I really don't know about those two! I truly only heard about Kato-san...... but I don't know much about it!``

Main.TextJPN: 「加藤さんは電車に飛び込み亡くなられました」
Main.TextENG: ``Kato-san jumped into a train and died.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…飛び込む直前の彼の奇怪な行動を駅員が目撃していますが詳細はわかりません」
Main.TextENG: ``...Just before his jump, a station attendant had witnessed his strange behavior, however I don't know the details.``

Main.TextJPN: 「知らない知らない知らないッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``I don't know, I don't know, I don't know!``

Main.TextJPN: 「森さんはどうです？　彼は職場でしたよね。あなたも出勤していたはずです」
Main.TextENG: ``How about Mori-san? He was at your workplace. So you should have been there at work.``

Main.TextJPN: 「職場！？　…知らないぞ！　何の事だい！？」
Main.TextENG: ``The workplace!? ...I didn't know that! What happened!?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…知らないですッ！　私は食事に出掛けてた！　…帰って来たら…騒がしくなっていて……終わってたんですよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``...I don't know! I went out for a meal! ...And when I came back... it was noisy...... it was already over!``

Main.TextJPN: 「私が帰って来た時にはもうッ！　…だから知らないッ！　何も知らないんですッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``It was already over when I came back! Therefore I don't know! I don't know anything!``

Main.TextJPN: 「初耳だよ！　…職場でそんな事があったら耳に入らないわけがない！」
Main.TextENG: ``This is the first time I've heard of this! ...I should have heard if such a thing happened in our workplace!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…さすがに、森さんの時は４人目でしたからね。“特殊”な事情について事前に警察の上層部と話がついていたようで、現場検証等も全て秘密で行われました」
Main.TextENG: ``...As I expected, Mori-san was the fourth person. I heard they talked with the highest ranks of the police in advance about 'special' circumstances. So all the on site investigations were probably performed in secret.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……覚えていますか？　…ガス弁の交換中に事故があって騒ぎになった日があったのを」
Main.TextENG: ``......Do you remember it? ...The day when there was an accident during the replacement of a gas value, it made such an uproar.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……そんな事もあったかな…。…工事業者と立ち会った職員がケガをして運び出されたって話で…。…騒然とした日があったような……」
Main.TextENG: ``......Now that you mention it... ...Some employees got injured while observing the contractors and were carried out... ...That was such a turbulent day......``

Main.TextJPN: 「無論、カバーストーリーです。事実は大きく異なります」
Main.TextENG: ``Of course, that was the cover story. The truth was very different.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…カバーストーリー？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Cover story?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…嘘の話のことよ。…事実を隠す為の偽りの話」
Main.TextENG: ``...It was a false story. ...A false story created in order to hide the truth.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…関係者の口が大変硬く、あまり詳しいことはよくわかりませんが、以下の事は確実です」
Main.TextENG: ``...Getting anything from the mouth of those involved was extremely difficult, so I'm not sure about many of the details. However, the following can be confirmed.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…昼休みの終わり頃、席で寝ていた森さんは突然起き出し、千枚通しで隣の席の職員を襲いました」
Main.TextENG: ``Towards the end of the lunch break, Mr. Mori, who had been asleep in his seat, suddenly woke up and attacked the staff members sitting next to him with an awl.``

Main.TextJPN: 「そのまま３人の職員に襲いかかり…取り押さえられる前に、自分の喉を突き刺し、絶命しました。わずか１～２分間の事です」
Main.TextENG: ``He attacked three members of staff... but before he was able to be subdued, he pierced his own throat, killing himself. It all happened in the time span of 1-2 minutes.``

Main.TextJPN: 「だから僕は食事に出てたんだよッ！知らないんだよッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``I said I went out for a meal! So I don't know!``

Main.TextJPN: 舞台、暗くなる。@k@r荒川にライトが当たる。@k@r荒川は千枚通しを持った森に追い詰められる所を回想している。
Main.TextENG: The stage becomes dark.@k@rLight shines on Arakawa.@k@rAs Arakawa recollects the time when@rhe was cornered with an awl.

Main.TextJPN: 「やめて下さいよ森さんッ！　“い”ませんよッ！　誰も“い”ませんよッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Mori-san, please stop! It doesn't 'exist'! Nothing 'exists'!``

Main.TextJPN: 「“いる”わけないじゃないですかッ！　“い”ないんですよッ！　落ち着いて下さいッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``It can't 'exist'! It doesn't 'exist'! So please calm down!``

Main.TextJPN: 「お伽話ですよ！　…“い”ないんだッ！　オヤシロさまなんて！　“い”ないんだぁあああぁッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``It's just a fairy tale! ...It doesn't 'exist'... Oyashiro-sama doesn't exist! It doesn't 'exist'!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……お手洗い。……すみません。…もう一度、失礼します」
Main.TextENG: ``......I need the restroom. ......I'm sorry. ...Once again, excuse me.``

Main.TextJPN: 荒川、辛そうに退場する。@k@r…再び雨の音。
Main.TextENG: Arakawa leaves in a painful way.@k@r...And once again, the sound of the rain can be heard.

Main.TextJPN: 「……知らなかった。……そんな事が…」
Main.TextENG: ``......I didn't know. ......About such a thing...``

Main.TextJPN: 「オヤシロさまの祟りの正体は判りません。…しかし間違いなくそれは実在します。そしてその謎を解く鍵はここ、雛見沢にあるはずなんです」
Main.TextENG: ``We don't know the real identity of the curse of Oyashiro-sama. ...However, it definitely exists. And the key to solving those mysteries should be somewhere in Hinamizawa.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……僕はね。…その何かを…調べに来たんですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``......So I... came to investigate this something.``

Main.TextJPN: 「………あなたも死ぬわ。……オヤシロさまの正体を探るなんて事そのものがオヤシロさまへの冒涜だもの」
Main.TextENG: ``.........You will die as well. ......Exploring its identity is something considered a desecration to Oyashiro-sama.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……もしそれが雛見沢を訪れた理由なら、…………あなたも死ぬわ」
Main.TextENG: ``......If that's your reason for visiting Hinamizawa............ you too will die.``

Main.TextJPN: 重苦しい沈黙。吉村は答えない。
Main.TextENG: Heavy silence. Yoshimura doesn't answer.

Main.TextJPN: 「…遅いねぇ。バス。……そろそろ来てもいい時間じゃないのかい？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Bus is late. ......This should be the time it arrives, shouldn't it?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…はは、…遅れてんじゃないすか？　………雨ですからー」
Main.TextENG: ``...Ha ha... you honestly don't know why it's late? .........Because of the rain.``

Main.TextJPN: 雨の音と共に舞台、徐々に暗転。@k@rしばらくの沈黙。@k@r舞台は真っ暗のまま。無線の声が聞こえる。
Main.TextENG: The stage along with the sound of the rain@rgradually becomes dark.@k@rThere is now silence.@k@rThe stage remains completely dark.@rVoice from the radio can be heard.

Main.TextJPN: 「……偵察班より報告。…部外者が混じっています」
Main.TextENG: ``......According to the reconnaissance teams report. ...Some outsiders have mingled in.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……予定外です。…中止しますか？」
Main.TextENG: ``......This is unexpected. ...Should we cancel it?``
